Title: Sinners and Saints
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Marguerite MacIntyre, Julie Plec, Michelle Paradise (executive story editor), Charlie Charbonneau (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Claire Holt, Phoebe Tonkin
Plot: Angered by recent events involving the safety of his unborn baby, Klaus demands answers from Sophie, believing she was involved. Sophie reveals to Klaus and Rebekah a troubling secret from ...
